Also of interest, after this happened my menu bar was totally messed up.  It had 4 entries in it:  Apple, 
Eclipse, File and Edit.  All of the other menu entries were missing.  There's nothing in my log specifically 
linked to menus however.  It seems like this symptom could be related to bug 107324...
